title: Fabrica
statement: Fabrica Research Centre is a residency for creative talents based in Treviso, Italy.

As a resident of Fabrica from 2014-2015, I was a video producer in the product design studio. I produced content for the studio, including a documentary short about the creative process for Moleskine. I collaborated with other residents on personal projects, like the animation "Peeing Cloud", and the documentary "Profile of a Musician", and the behind the scenes of "Usually Nowhere". I also worked with filmmakers in the editorial studio on projects, including "Waiting for the Gods" by Natalie Welsh and Alessandro Bertelle.
